about_the_game:
The content included in the Digital Deluxe edition:

● Atelier Marie Plus: The Alchemist of Salburg
The original version "Atelier Marie Plus" will become available on the title menu.
You can compare the original version with the remake, and enjoy the atmosphere of the original game as it was when it was first released, with upgraded resolution and localized for the very first time.

● Gust Extra BGM Pack
A selection of 400 BGM tracks from past Gust titles such as "Atelier Ryza 2" and "Atelier Sophie 2" that can be used to change BGM in-game.

● "Another Look" Costume Set
A set of 33 costumes, 3 different color variations of the default character outfit for each of the 11 party members.

Note:
In-game BGM can be changed from the desk in the atelier.
The costumes from the "Another Look" set can only be applied to characters that have joined your party.
This upgrade pack contains the same content as the "Atelier Marie Remake: The Alchemist of Salburg Digital Deluxe Edition" product, please beware of making redundant purchases.
